DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate effect robotic gait therapy brain reorganization hemiplegia patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Robot-assisted Gait Training Brain Reorganization Hemiplegic Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study design interventional pre-post compare clinical study . The subject receive conventional physical therapy Walkbot training ( 3 session per week 7 week , 20 session ) . Before intervention subject evaluate use diffusion tensor image clinical outcome measurement .
DOC.criteria: First stroke attack Within 3 month stroke onset Supratentorial stroke Unilateral stroke Bilateral stroke infratentorial stroke Cognitive disabilities serious psychiatric illness . Difficulty walk due orthopedic problem .
